text: How do you request access to the <#CES6JU0RY|drag-drop-email-beta> beta?

<@U24DCSJBE> watches over that channel. Also FYI i dont know if there are known security reasons to hide hub ids but it's generally a good practice to not post them publicly, and instead only DM them to HS employees when asked
<@UG7S8J18D> I do not know if it is the correct way of doing it. But we’ve always messaged HS via support chat/ticket about it in a new portal to get it opened. Takes couple minutes usually.
I don’t know how I missed the “link” field addition to custom modules but….thank you! #lifesaver #timesaver

FYI I released a new CRM integration guide which includes an up to date ERD for CRM objects <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/update-crm-integration-guide>  Let me know if you have any questions or feedback
